name: Dancing Queen (itch)
description:
You are Kara, who has just moved to a new city. There's a little party where people elect the "Dancing Queen"... how will you integrate in this party ? Will you please people and make them your friend or assert your personnality ?


  • Dive in a party where people know each other, but you know nobody.

  • A psychological visual novel with a very distrubing art.

  • A hundred of different endings

  • Meet super cliche characters like the philosophal drug dealer, the "thispartyissolame" or the shy true geek girl.


Follow @4EdgesGames on Twitter !
